name: visual
label: Visual settings
description: These options will let you control visual aspects.

fields.name: imageWidth
fields.label: Image width
fields.description: Select the width of the space given that the image should cover. The image's height will be scaled accordingly.

fields.name: imageAlignment
fields.label: Image alignment
fields.description: Select where the image should be positioned relative to the rest of the content.

fields.name: zoomLenseWidth
fields.label: Zoom lense width
fields.description: Set the width of the zoom lense as percentage of the image's width (e.g. 20%) or as a fixed value in pixels (e.g. 160px).

fields.name: zoomLenseHeight
fields.label: Zoom lense height
fields.description: Set the height of the zoom lense as percentage of the image's height (e.g. 25%) or as a fixed value in pixels (e.g. 90px).

fields.name: darkenImageOnZoom
fields.label: Darken image on zoom
fields.description: If set, the image will darken to strengthen the focussing effect of zooming.

name: behaviour
label: Behavioural settings
description: These options will let you control how the task behaves.

fields.name: autoZoom
fields.label: Automatic zooming
fields.description: If checked, the image gets magnified automatically while hovering it. Otherwise, the user needs to toggle magnification on and off.
